name: Koko Rabusutori Demo Version
description: Welcome to the web page of my first ever game! This is only the demo version at the moment, but I promise that the final version will be out soon. A big thanks to all the people who post there art on itch.io for free download because I wouldn't have a game if it weren't for them! Anyway, I hope you enjoy the game and stick around for the official release!
